page.title: 13Farming/Industry in Wetton
page.content:
{Farming in Wetton} The acreage of a farm in the Wetton area varies up to 1,000 acres. Lots of land is hilly with steep slopes covered in woodland. The ground around Wetton is dryish and grass yields are an average size. There is roughly 50% rough grazing and 50% meadow land for silage and hay.
{Industry in Wetton} In Wetton there is a strong community feeling which includes many farms that maintain a good livelihood from rearing beef, lamb and good dairy herds. There is a thriving tourist industry. There is also a business that prints on T-shirts, sweatshirts etc.
